Class Zoomboat

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Battleship
        • Zoomboat
  • public class Zoomboat
extends Battleship
    Zoomboats are Battleship with the special functionality of being the only ship that is able to move after the initial pre-game phase. By using WASD, players can opt to use a turn to reposition their Zoomboats one cell up, down, left, or right. Zoomboats have one hit point and are 1x1 cells in size.
    Version:
    June 14, 2020
    Author:
    Daniel Wei

      • Zoomboat

        public Zoomboat​(int hp,
                boolean isLeft,
                BattleWorld bw)
        Create a Zoomboat with specified hp, player association, and BattleWorld
        Parameters:
        hp - The HP this Zoomboat will start with.
        isLeft - True if this Zoomboat belongs to the left side player, false if it belongs to the right side player.
        bw - The BattleWorld this Zoomboat is in.
